page.title: 02DUFTON SHOP AS A LIVING
page.content: After a year at the shop/Post Office, the young couple with 2 children (7 & 10) are pleased with their situation. Finance is not easy,especially in a bad summer,& there is not much spare time to enjoy walks together.But it is nice working at home because when the shop is quiet,one of them can get on with the chores,leaving them free to go out after closing hours.They have built up a good greengrocery line, as the prices can be competitive.They hope to go into takeaway foods for the summer visitors.The wife may look for part-time work in winter to keep busier;the village population is very small.The husband would look after the shop.He likes the quiet life,having worked in cities and been pensioned off through injury.The children are at the excellent local school & are happy there.
